title: Home Remedies — Acupuncture Healing Center NEW
cleaned_text: Allergies or something else? The changing of seasons can bring changes in our bodies as well. Knowing when something needs immediate attention will help you achieve a speedy recovery. See below for home remedies that will boost your immune system and help your body have the strength it needs to transition to Spring. Home Remedies ACV/Lemon Shot (Good Morning Elixir) Ingredients: 1 Tablespoon Apple Cider Vinegar Juice from ½ of a lemon 1 teaspoon of Manuka Honey Directions: 1. Mix all ingredients and drink every morning. Digestion Aid Makes: 2 Servings Ingredients: 5 Organic celery stalks 1 large organic cucumber 2 organic parsley sprigs 2 organic cilantro sprigs 1 organic lemon, peeled 1 to 1 ½ inch knob of ginger, peeled Directions: 1. Wash all ingredients and cut into chunks. 2. Pass all of the ingredients through your juicer.* Reserve the pulp for another use (it makes great soup!) 3. Serve immediately for optimal vitamin and mineral content. *If you don't have a juicer, blend the ingredients in the blender on high until well combined and smooth, adding water to make blending possible if needed. Then pass the mixture through a fine colander and drink. Ginger Tea Ingredients: 1 Cup ginger, chopped 2 Cups water Directions: 1. Add ingredients to a VitaMix or blender and process mixture until it is well blended / fine consistency. 2. Drain ginger mixture through a small sieve/colander. 3. Drink 1 ounce, twice a day.
